title: A.W.H.Pearsall read History at Cambridge University, then saw service in the Royal Navy 1944–7, joined the National Maritime Museum, Greenwich, UK first as Research Assistant, then as Custodian of Manuscripts, and subsequently as Historian. He is Vice-President of the Navy Records Society and member of the Publications Committee, member of the Committee of the Fortress Study Group and of the Association of British Transport Museums, and formerly member of Council of Society of Archivists
